resources.string: "Error: Program files could not be found! Check the dalvik-cache location to solve this problem! Default: /data/dalvik-cache/*"
Thanks for english translation: ChelpuS, Ms_Julia, p0izn@xda

Lucky Patcher is a universal patching tool. It is intended to modify applications in the following ways: Remove ads, Remove Google license verification (Automatically and manually), Manage permissions, and more.
Shows all apps with Google Ads.
All changes were fixed in ODEX and will persist until the application is reinstalled!
Use the Magisk module to apply the patch
Error: APK file could not be found.
Naming scheme for new APK files.
App could not be found! Please install the application and try again.
This app could not be found in the installed apps list.
App Data is empty. There is nothing to backup.
Error: Something went wrong. The backup is most likely incomplete.
Do you really want to delete this backup
Do you really want to delete backup app settings
Cannot restore application settings because it is not installed.
Do you really want restore backup app settings
No backup files were found in:
Root not stable. Try again or update your root. Try changing the java-root method in the settings of Lucky Patcher. It can help sometimes.
Do you want to try to get this item for free?
To disable auto-repeat you must select app and go to \"Tools\"->\"Remove selected saved purchases\" and delete item.

"- For the best results you must make a patch to Android \"Signature Verification status always True\"; - To disable the hack go to \"Switches\" on the bottom panel Lucky Patcher and choose \"Disable Google Billing Emulation\"."

Requires \"Support patch for InApp and LVL\" to target Application and applied \"Patch to Android\". Use custom patch \"Support.InApp.LVL...\" for Google Play for right purchase information and price within the application.
Send a reply to the application unsigned (this may work for non-root users)
If the purchase fails, try changing the type of this purchase in \"%1s\"->\"%2s\".
This service is needed for \"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\" and rebuild the application with him.
Proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases
Proxy server for emulation of license check
Do you want to remove this directory bind?
Binding failed! Data directory could not be found on device.
Warning: Busybox could not be found. Lucky Patcher cannot continue without Busybox...
You can change the default icon for Lucky Patcher in your launcher.
Make data and cache backups for installation.
Clone application (It work not for all)
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"Block Internet for selected apps May not work on Android 4+"
APK with changed Permissions and Activities
"Disable components 'pm disable' method (may be enabled by the application)"
Turn back on Google Ads services
Try to hide Lucky Patcher from other Apps. Burden on the system, use only if needed.
Integrate dalvik code to already installed application
Move selected apps to internal storage
Move selected apps to SD Card
Re-sign with original signature for android patch \"%1s\".
"Change Permissions and Activities Rebuild and Install"
"Change Permissions and Activities Save original Signature (Safe method)"
Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation
"Unblock Internet for selected apps May not work on Android 4+"
Removes http:// links using templates from files AdsBlockList_user_edit.txt and AdsBlockList.txt.
"Patch on Reboot (Unstable! Only for patching libs)"
Necessary for emulations InApp, LVL and keygens. Needed for right verification of purchases and licenses.

"Allows the modification of an application without creating a signature again, so the developer's signature will stay untouched. Other users can install this .apk only after applying a patch to the Android Core (useful when translating, modifying graphics, etc. in protected applications)"
Disable signature verification in the package manager
Allows Installation of applications with different signatures on top of each other.
"+ Allows the installation of applications with an older version than the one that is already installed."
Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation
Needed for emulation to work without the Support patch to Applications.
Remove all patches from the Android services.jar
Remove all patches from the Android core.jar
Attempts to make the app work offline.
If it exists, allow an internet connection on the first launch. This group of patches makes minor changes.
If it exists, there is probably no need for an internet connection on the first launch.
Still unstable, but very effective. If it exists, allow an internet connection on the first launch.
Templates for final license verification. If this works, the application will work without an internet connection.
If \"Final License Verification\" was not successful, you can try these patches.
Attempts to resize ads so that they will become smaller.
Attempts to resize Google Ads to Null/Zero
"Try to break the Google Ads' obtaining mechanism."
Other patches which can be useful to remove ads.
Black rectangle that covers a banner (visible when \"Resize Ads to ...\" disabled ).
"Make the ad module think that it's offline."
Remove License Verification for applications from the Amazon Market.
Removing Google Play dependencies and others...
The minimal number of patches. Suitable for most applications with simple protection.
There are a few differences from the \"Auto mode\". It may help you, if \"Auto mode\" was unsuccessful.
Additional patches (may cause instability). Apply only if the other patterns were unsuccessful. Requires internet. Try to use together with \"Auto mode\" or \"Auto mode (Inversed)\".

By default all changes are written to odex-file. But this method will not work properly if application has been moved to the external SD card. In this situation the \"Apply Patch to dalvik-cache\" could help. You can restore the application only by re-installation.
"Will copy the application package file to Lucky Patcher's folder on the SD card. You can restore the application from the copied APK."
Deletes dalvik cache of the application to save space after creating the odex-file. If the application does not work well with odex, you will have to reinstall this application.
Remove License Verification for Apps from SamsungApps.
"Error: Android can't make patch with option \"patch only dalvik-cache\". Dalvik cache for core.jar could not be found."
"Error: Android can't make patch with option \"patch only dalvik-cache\". Dalvik cache for services.jar could not be found."
If device freezes or all patches do not work, please reboot device manually.
"Android Patch for dalvik-cache finished. Results are: "

Dalvik-cache of core.jar has been patched, but this type of Patch can disappear when updating the dalvik-cache. Not enough space in the System ROM for creating core.odex. Please free about 4MB, clear dalvik-cache and try again. Please reboot device to apply patch to dalvik-cache.
Patch dalvik-cache always on reboot (only if patches to core.jar are removed after reboot).
The downloaded file is corrupted. Please check that there is enough free space on the SD Card then try again later.
It does not work for all applications. If the clone is not installed, you need to remove the original. If this method does not work, try to create a clone of a different way.
It does not work for all applications. This method attempts to change the resources and classes.dex. Such a clone more isolated from the original.
Error: Name of directory is empty.
"Success! The license has been created successfully. Try to test the application while offline. Maybe you'll get lucky."
APK rebuilt for InApp and LVL emulation

"Note! If the application works fine after the patch, there's no guarantee that it will work fine in the modified-apk form - some applications are protected from modification. You will tend to have greater luck with patching, than with modifying."

"Note! Some apps need to be uninstalled before installation of cloned application. There's no guarantee that it will work fine in the cloned-apk form - some applications are protected from modification."
Custom Patch not valid for this Version of the Programm or already patched.
Not all patterns are replaced, but the program can work, test it!

"Custom Patch not Found. It's problem with root. Don't have access to SD card from root. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu. If it not help, please update SuperSu and update binary file su from SuperSu."
No updates for custom patches were found.
Shows all apps with a custom patch applied.

Set the maximum number of days old that an application can be while still being considered new. Set to 0 days if you want to disable the movement of recently installed applications to the top of the list.
Do you really want to delete file %s?
(mini version with license and inapp emulation only)
%1$s was signed by a test signature successfully. Resigned file is located %2$s.

This application is part of the Android operating system. Be very careful while performing any operations on it, because you can soft-brick your device. Do you have a backup? Are you sure you want to work with this application?
"Change the directory on the SD Card where Lucky Patcher will store its files. The default path is /mnt/sdcard/Android/data/[package_name_of_lucky_patcher]/files/LuckyPatcher"
InApp Services to Google Play Store
Some Apps crash if multiple InApp services are enabled.
License Service to Google Play Store
Some Apps crash if multiple license services are enabled.
Your Lucky Patcher has been modified. You can not send a log.
Please update Lucky Patcher to last version for send log.
You must create at least one bind to add widget.
You are using the latest version of Lucky Patcher.
Failed to backup APK file. The classes.dex files are missing inside the application.
You can not install applications from this place, please place it on the SD card.
Lucky Patcher must be installed on the internal memory. Otherwise, some features may not work properly.
"Lucky Patcher must be installed on the internal memory. This feature doesn't work when Lucky Patcher is on an external sd."
Failed to backup APK file. No permissions to copy.
"The file \".jar\" doesn't contain classes.dex for patch. Try patching \".odex\" file for this \".jar\" file."
An error in the log collector occurred. Log not created.
"Could not create the file join_patch.txt. There may not be permissions to write to the patch folder."

Error creating .oat file for patched classes.dex. Patch has made some errors in classes.dex or some problems with the firmware. Try changing the java-root method in the settings of Lucky Patcher. It can help sometimes.
"Could not delete the file join_patch.txt Delete the file manually or patch folder."
It appears that Lucky Patcher has force-closed, do you want to send a bug report?
Could not get the classes.dex files for the patch.
Error: Did not get pkg info.
Lucky Patcher can not import custom patch. Zip archive damaged.
Unable To Share Application. Unknown error. Try changing the working directory for Lucky Patcher.
Data for making a license could not be found.
License location could not be found.
Error: Creating odex process failed... Probably not enough disk space left.
This app does not contain classes.dex. Dex optimization is not possible.
Not enough memory (RAM) to complete this operation. The VM Heap is too small.
Directory already exists. Please enter a new path.
"Patch completed! Launch and check the application's license status; -If this pattern doesn't help, tap \"Restore\" and repeat the procedure with another pattern."
"Tags could not be found for this pattern. Already patched? Tap \"Restore\", select another pattern and patch it again."
"Disables the loading of icons from Lucky Patcher's database. This makes the application list laggy..."
"App could not be copied to the SD card! Please free up some space on the SD card or check your busybox installation."
Apps with SEND_SMS and CALL_PHONE permissions
Google Play has been installed. Now core.jar will be patched and your device will be rebooted. Continue?
Shows all apps with fixed changes (Yellow star mark).
Lucky Patcher did not find any bytes to patch.
Log is not created. In the process of creating an error occurred.

"% Luck! Please run the application for testing!
If the application works incorrectly, please reinstall it and do not try to patch this version of it."
Clear data of google services for fix the problem of logging into google account inside Google Play
"Hides Lucky Patcher's title in the list of applications. Works only on devices with a hardware menu button."
The server is not accessible. Try again later.
Changes in \"hosts\" file could not be found...
Auto-repeat purchases with the current settings
Used for personification of advertising and for analytics. If you have concerns about any of these permissions, you can deny these permissions. This will not affect to work of the Lucky Patcher.
"Need to work with files. Without it, Lucky Patcher will not work. "
Install Google Play as User App.
Requires: already applied \"Patch to Android\" and installed Google Play Store.
Error: base.apk file not found inside apks file.
Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
If you have miui firmware, you can solve the problem turning off \"Turn on MIUI optimizations\" in the \"Developer Settings\" of the firmware.
Application is incompatible with this device
Your ROM is incompatible with rootless installer. Installation is possible only with the help of the root installer.
Not enough storage space to install the app
Your firmware does not support installing split apks files.
Preparing to install a split application.
Installer gets files from apks archive.
Dalvik code integrated from selected apk file. It can not work correct, but you must test...
Do you really want integrate dalvik code from apk file to
Do you really want to integrate update for this app to /system?
You have entered an invalid number...

Alternative for the modded Google Play. Confirms the licenses for applications. Requires \"Support patch for InApp and LVL\" to target Application or applied \"Patch to Android\". This could be bad for legally purchased applications (requires custom patch \"Support.InApp.LVL...\" for Google Play in order to avoid problems).
Lucky Patcher imported the following custom patches and files:
Shows all apps with License Verification.
If you have problems with this feature, you need to disable Magisk Сore Only mode and MagiskHide in the settings of Magisk Manager and reboot device.
If you have problems with this feature, you must enable the magisk module option.

"Press the \"Install\" button to replace the official Google Play Store with a cracked LVL (License Verification Library) version. If the Google Play Store does not work after reboot, install it again. How the modded Google Play Store works: Attention! You *CANNOT* download paid applications for free! 1. You can use GoogleLVL-protected applications without having to crack them. 2. License verification will succeed even while being offline. 3. There is no need to apply license patches any more. 4. It will not work with Billing and License Verification via Proxy. 5. Now when you press the 'Refund' button, it will refund your purchase, but the application will not be uninstalled, therefore you won't need to backup the application prior to requesting a refund. 6.Now Google Play redirect all purchases to Lucky Patcher for emulation InApp."
"Can not extract AndroidManifest.xml. Perhaps you don't have enough free space on the SD card to copy the entire application."

Dalvik-cache of core.jar has been patched, but this type of patch can disappear when updating the dalvik-cache. Right now your core.jar will be optimized (created odex). Please make a nandroid backup before tapping \"Yes\". The device may not respond for a few minutes. As a result, the device may freeze and require you to reboot manually. After booting go to \"Troubleshooting\", press \"clear dalvik-cache\" and \"Remove fixes and backups\". Got a backup? Create core.odex now?
"Path could not be found! Please enter a correct path."
"SD card could not be found! This function can not work without SD Card!"
The original apk file is corrupted. The application can not be rebuilt.
Please check \"Allow installation of applications from unknown sources\" within Security settings.
Proxy server for Google Play need apply Android patch \"Signature Verification status always True\". You want to apply a Android patch now?
Do you really want to clear dalvik-cache?
"Do you really want to clear all of the application's data?"
Do you really want to delete odex file?
Installation finished with an error. You must uninstall the original application before installing this APK. If this does not help, reboot device manually. Also, try uninstalling the application.
"Moving to internal memory finished with an error (try again): "
"Moving to SD Card finished with an error (try again): "
Do you really want to exit from Lucky Patcher?
The patching process is over. For final use, you must reboot the device. Do you want to restart your device?
Do you really want to delete %1$s and install selected version application?

If you use \"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\" for hacking purchases, then you need to install a Proxy server for inapp purchases service. But it will break the invisibility of Lucky Patcher. Do you want to install this service?
Do you really want to install the Lucky Patcher v.%1$s?

If you use \"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\" for hacking license check, then you need to install a Proxy server for License Verification service. But it will break the invisibility of Lucky Patcher. Do you want to install this service?
Lucky Patcher has been successfully installed. Now you need to remove the application installer to increase the stealth of the Lucky Patcher.

An old version of Lucky Patcher has been found. To improve the hiding of the Lucky Patcher, you need to remove this version. But if you used the \"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\", you will have to re-patch all applications or rebuild the original apk in the new version of Lucky Patcher. Do you want to remove this old version?
Do you really want to reboot?
Do you really want to remove all odex files from /system/app and /data/app? This will only delete odex files of applications that have classes.dex.
Do you really want to rescan all installed apps?
Testing the possibility of installing an application with different signatures
Testing the possibility of installing an application without signature ver.2 and targetSDK=30
The ability to apply the patch is unlocked.
Unable to check the patch points because \"pm\" utility is not working properly.
Disabling InApp service violates the mechanism for official purchases to applications. It is an original service to Google Play.
Enabling LVL emulation service violates the mechanism for obtaining a license to some officially purchased applications
Disabling this service violates the mechanism for obtaining a license to officially purchased applications. It is original service to Google Play.

"Google Play possibly installed but isn't working properly. Test license check failed. Maybe you didn't apply the core.jar patch (can be found in \"Toolbox-> Patch to Android\") or not set the modified Google Play as a system application (you can re-install in \"Toolbox-> Install Modded Google Play Store\")."
Turn off internet on the device then try the test again.
Test results for the modified Google Play
Google Play is installed and working properly. Note that this method does not work with all applications and games. This is not an error and cannot be fixed.
Shows all modified apps (Green clover mark).
All data has been successfully transferred to

Tap to switch to selecting a year
Please select one or more custom patch.
A new version of Lucky Patcher is available!

"It is not an error. There was not enough free space to create .odex file. Dalvik-cache patch was applied, but if you reboot the patch might not persist. Solution: move application to internal storage or make as system or free up more space, or leave everything as is and re-apply patch regularly."
Removes all application icons in the list. This reduces operational overhead which is useful for low-end devices.

"Failure to obtain root access! You must have full root access to continue...
(please update busybox or su)! Please install SuperSu (\"Troubleshooting-> Install SuperSU (ICS)\") and update su binaries with it."
Source of updates could not be found

Error: there is not enough space to copy all of the data in the specified folder. Please change the directory or free-up some space. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu.
Error: there is not enough space within the internal memory. Please free up more space in /data then try again. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu.

Error: there is not enough space within the System partition to move the application. Please free up space in /system then try again. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu.
Error: there is not enough space on the System partition. Please free up more space in /system then try again. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu.
Shows all apps in which nothing was found.
Changelog file could not be found. It will be downloaded the next time you update.
Apply Android patch to dalvik-cache from core.jar.
Apply Android patch to dalvik-cache from services.jar.
"ODEX All System Apps (More free space on internal storage)"
Do you really want to ODEX all System apps?
"Error! There is probably not enough free space in /system. Some apps weren't ODEXed."
Solves some problems with the functions of Lucky Patcher, but it can reboot of some firmware.
Must be enabled to send a detailed error log.
Enable the ability to install apk files via Lucky Patcher (on some buggy firmware this option will block the installation of apk files from external file manager)
Packing files into an apk file ...
Reassembling a dex file with new strings (wait a long time)
At once can use \"Signature Verification status always True\" and \"Disable .apk Signature Verification\" or \"Disable signature verification in the package manager\".
Firmware have odexed core.jar. \"patch only dalvik-cache\" will be disabled. And selection of other patches will be reset.
Firmware have odexed services.jar. \"patch only dalvik-cache\" will be disabled. And selection of other patches will be reset.
No description available for this permission
"Google often defines Lucky Patcher as a virus but it's not. To remove this reminder, launch Google Play and in the settings disable \"Play Protect\"."

"Many websites and pages share fake Lucky Patcher app. So, we would like to request you to share our Official Website download link on your blog or YouTube videos. Official Download link: https://www.luckypatchers.com/download/"
Do you want to run the \"Play protect\" dialog?
"% Luck! Patch Failed! Unknown version of LVL or patch is already applied!"
Proxy server for redirecting all inapp and license requests to Lucky Patcher. InApp Services to Google Play and Google Billing Emulation need to be enabled in Lucky Patcher.
Proxy Google Play file not found for install.
Do you really want to install Proxy Google Play?
\"Support patch for InApp and LVL emulation\" must be disabled in Xposed module for Lucky Patcher in order to run Proxy Google Play.
Proxy Google Play needs root access and needs patch to android \"Signature Verification status always True\" to be applied or enabled in Xposed module for Lucky Patcher.
This can help some Unity games. If the purchase fails, just change its type to another and try again.

There is nothing to sort yet. To sort purchases, you need to launch the application and try to buy something for free, and if Lucky Patcher has difficulties with sorting purchases, then you can sort them manually. This is needed for Unity games. If you change the type of purchase in the sorter, then there is an additional chance to buy for free.

All purchase records will be deleted. To display the purchases list, you need to restart the target program. Are you sure you want to remove the definitions for all purchases so that Lucky Patcher will try to guess their type later?
Choose the type for each purchase
these are usually gold, crystals and other consumables.
these are usually subscriptions, additional levels, disable ads, and the like.
"Reboot processed... If the device does not reboot automatically, do it manually..."

Error: Something went wrong. Data may not have been restored completely.

Root access is required for this action...
You must move the application to /system/app/ or apply patch to core.jar \"Disable .apk Signature Verify\" from \"Patch to Android\".
saved to /sdcard/LuckyPatcher/ as a custom patch.

Installation to internal storage of mobile
Installation to external media like SD Card
If you press back, Lucky Patcher ask for confirmation to exit.
If you have problems getting root rights or working with patches, you can try another method.
If you have exotic root, you can force set root to root or non-root.
If the installation in root mode is very long, you can force switch to non-root mode.
Show only files used by Lucky Patcher
Do you really want to share this App?

Installing a modded Google Play requires the use of patches to Android. Your device will be rebooted. After rebooting, try installing Google Play again. Sometimes this can damage the firmware. Do you want to apply patches for Android?
Support patch for InApp emulation (Reassembly Dex)

It will last a very long time. Redirect billing to Lucky Patcher without proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases. If this method did not work for some reason, you can use method \"Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)\". If patch to Android \"Signature Verification status always True\" is not applied, this support patch can help.
"Method Support patch for InApp emulation (Reassembly Dex) \" finished with errors. Use method \"Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)\" to emulate free purchases inside this application."

This rebuilt application will only work with Lucky Patchter installed on this device. If you transfer this application to another device, purchases will not be emulated. To transfer the application to another device with a support patch, use the method \"Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)\" and install the \"Proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases\" on another device, or rebuild this application directly on another device.
Support patch for InApp emulation (Proxy server)
Redirect billing to Lucky Patcher using a proxy server for emulation of inapp purchases. If patch to Android \"Signature Verification status always True\" is not applied, this support patch can help.
Update patch in already patched application
If you rebuilt the application with this patch for the old version of Lucky Patcher and now it does not work, this option will update the patch for the new version of Lucky Patcher.

Redirect license verification to Lucky Patcher using a \"Proxy server for emulation of license check\". If patch to Android \"Signature Verification status always True\" is not applied, this support patch can help.
Auto backup all updated or installed apps
Copy APK file to backup folder
Auto backup Apps updated or installed from Google Play
Note: Lucky Patcher marks all modified apps as installed from Google Play. Therefore, these applications will also be in the backup list.
Automatically integrate update to /system for system apps
Reboot is required for second update
Automatically move updated and installed apps to internal memory
Makes apps faster and more stable
Automatically move updated and installed apps to SD Card
Bad for apps with widgets and actions on boot
Warning! Please make a *BACKUP* before modifying.

Service test failed. Something is not working properly. You must provide all the necessary permissions (work in the background, etc.) for the application %1$s and for Lucky Patcher. Open settings for %1$s?
We make a test for the service to find errors.
Select apps to integrate updates to /system:
Select apps to move to internal storage:
Select apps to move to SD Card:
Lucky patcher transfers settings from the old version.
Do you really want to remove %s?
New custom patches are found on the server. The list of added patches you can see on the link https://patch.chelpus.com/
Do you want to update them now?
Enable haptic feedback in the application list.

Chinese MIUI firmware often limits the work of the Lucky Patcher in the background. Because of this, InApp purchase emulation and other functions do not work. Open the Lucky Patcher settings to enable all possible permissions for it?
It is impossible to get the full apk file for \"%1$s\", as it is splitted using Google’s Android App Bundle. This feature cannot be used with \"%1$s\".
Your firmware force stopped Lucky Patcher with error: \"No space left on device\". Try check free space on device. If you use SuperSu, try disable \"mount namespace separation\" in SuperSu.
There is not enough free space on the device. To continue the work, free up more space.
Your firmware force stopped Lucky Patcher with error: \"Out of Memory\". Not enough memory for the current operation.
Import archive contain apk file. Do you want to install %1$s version %2$s build %3$s ?
It appears that Lucky Patcher has force-closed. Please update Lucky Patcher to last version.

"Your firmware doesn't support InApp billing emulation by default. If your firmware supports disabling (freeze) for Application, try disabling Google Play from Application manager and try start InApp emulation again."
This version of modded GooglePlay cannot be installed in the system partition. Install it as a user application. Otherwise, you will not be able to connect to your google account.

You can install the original Google Play as system, and then as user modded Google Play. If you have problems with Google Play, try to install it as user app with the option \"%1s\" and give it all permissions.

Lucky Patcher can not write or read data in data folder. To correct this problem, clear data for Lucky Patcher. If this does not help. Uninstall Lucky patcher, install it and give him all the necessary permissions.
Your firmware has a jex-optimization. Firmware patch impossible. Change the firmware or upgrade to Android 5+.
Browser on the device could not be found to display the internet link.

"Lucky Patcher has changed the package name. This brings with it some problems. If you use \"Support patch for InApp emulation\", you will have to apply the patch again to the targets applications. If you rebuilded some applications with a patch \"Support patch for InApp emulation\", you'll need to rebuild the originals again in the new Lucky Patcher."

The Package Name was not changed correctly. If you use the patch \"Support patch for InApp emulation\", the patch can not be applied to applications. When you rebuild applications with this patch, there will be errors.
Lucky Patcher cannot continue his work, as not all the necessary permissions are granted to him.
"You need the Lucky Patcher installed on another device to be able to install 'apks' files. You can transfer the Lucky Patcher to another device from the side menu '%s'."
Lucky Patcher scan SuperSu and detect enabled option \"mount namespace separation\". You need disable it for normal work Lucky Patcher.
Want you to Lucky Patcher disable it self (will reboot)?
Components of the application have been successfully updated.
Please enable Lucky Patcher module in Xposed to activate this option
